contents: @RandomID_1:人家本来的文章非常谨慎，“A prominent hypothesis states that this correlation reflects behavioral biases toward intuitive problem solving, which causes errors when intuition conflicts with reasoning. ” “ These results support the hypothesis that behavioral biases rather than impaired general intelligence underlie the religiosity effect.” 用的词是correlation。八卦门户网站某种程度上曲解了，引起了误会。
